Title: The Third Ortolan
Writer: Brian Koppelman (created by), David Levien (created by), Andrew Ross Sorkin (created by), Alice O'Neill, Alice O'Neill (story editor), Randall Green (story editor), Wes Taylor (story editor)
Actors: Paul Giamatti, Damian Lewis, Maggie Siff, Malin Akerman
Plot: Axe tracks down a critical piece of evidence that could destroy him; both Axe and Chuck reckon with how far they are willing to go to protect Wendy; the Ice Juice case comes to a head when a judge gives Connerty a difficult deadline.
